name: historical-backtesting-server
description: A REST API service for backtesting individual trades/strategies on historical market data
author: Coinfarm Ventures L.L.C.

scripts.reinstallCommonLibs: npm uninstall tradingbot-common-libraries && npm install tradingbot-common-libraries
scripts.reinstallCommonClasses: npm uninstall tradingbot-common-classes && npm install tradingbot-common-classes
scripts.reinstallCommonApiSdk: npm uninstall tradingbot-common-apisdk-ts && npm install tradingbot-common-apisdk-ts
scripts.reinstallCommonNest: npm uninstall tradingbot-common-nest && npm install tradingbot-common-nest
scripts.codeArtifactLogin: aws codeartifact login --tool npm --repository CAR_TradingBot-NodeJS-Private_DEV --domain coinfarmtradingbot-priv --domain-owner [censored]
scripts.ecrLogin: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-2 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin [censored].dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com
scripts.ecrLogin:codeBuild: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-2 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin [censored].dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com
scripts.buildDockerImage:local: npm run refreshNpmRcFile && docker build -f Dockerfile_historical-backtesting-server_local -t historical-backtesting-server_local . --build-arg configName=config-local-docker
scripts.buildDockerImage:ecs: NPM_VERSION=$npm_package_version; npm run refreshNpmRcFile && docker build -f Dockerfile_historical-backtesting-server_ecs -t coinfarmtradingbot/historical-backtesting-server:latest -t coinfarmtradingbot/historical-backtesting-server:$NPM_VERSION . --build-arg configName=config-aws-ecs
scripts.buildRunDockerImage:local: npm run buildDockerImage:local && npm run runDockerImage:local
scripts.buildPushDockerImage:ecs: npm run buildDockerImage:ecs && npm run pushDockerImage:ecs
